meanings.definition: Cause (someone) to be unable to pass feces.
meanings.sent1: Eating too much cheese constipates some people.
meanings.sent2: Not drinking enough water can constipate you.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn traffic constipates the flow of cars on the highway.
meanings.sent4: His strict rules constipate the creativity of his students.
meanings.sent5: The narrow hallway constipates the movement of the furniture.

meanings.sent1: If you ignore the urge to go to the bathroom, you may constipate.
meanings.sent2: Eating too many bananas can constipate some people.
meanings.sent3: The lack of rain constipates the growth of the plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her anxiety constipates her ability to make decisions.
meanings.sent5: The cluttered desk constipates the search for important documents.
